tool.name: Extract & categorize orthologs

param.name: requirelimiter
param.label: Should extracted core set of single-copy genes contain the limiter added in OrthoMCL step?
param.help: Enable this option to limit the identified shared orthologs to orthologs that also contain limiter. Disabling this option does not impose this restriction, but identified orthologs could still be influenced by limiter.

tool.help:
For the groups or orthologous genes identified using OrthoMCL, this tool:
- extracts the DNA sequences of the single-copy orthologous genes shared across all genomes
- extracts the DNA sequences of the multiple-copy orthologous genes shared across all genomes
- extracts the DNA sequences of the variable-copy orthologous genes shared across a subset of genomes
- generates statistics on the ortholog extraction process in tabular format
